name: 陸志成
objective:
教學大綱: syllabus
一.課程概要簡介 course summary

二..籃球.規則與注意事項 basketball rules and precautions

三.培養學生運動習慣 develop students exercise habits 

四.學習避運動傷害的發生  learn to avoid sports injuries
schedule:
第1週:課程介紹及宣導上課注意事項                            第2週:傳球 
1.week:course introduction and promotion precautions  2.week:pass rhe ball to a teammate
 
第3週:雙手胸前傳球                                                       第4週:單手肩上傳球 
3.week:passing the chest with both hands                       4.week:one-handed shoulder 
                                                                                            uploading the ball                                                                    
                                                                                    
第5週:背後傳球                                                               第6週:單手地板傳球 
5.week:pass behind                                                          6.week:one-handed floor bounce 
                                                                                            ball
第7週:籃球原地運球練習                                               第8週:兩人運球上籃
7.week:basketball dribbling practice                               8.week:dribble layup

第9週:三人交叉運球上籃                                        第10週:換手左右運球 
9.week:three - person crossover dribble                   10.week:change hands and dribble

第11週 :全場運球上籃                                             第12週:急停換手運球
11.week:full dribble layup                                        12.week:energency stop ,change the ball     

13週:轉身運球                                                         第14週:換手運球過人
13.turn around and dribble                                       14.week:change the ball to pass the ball

第15週:投籃                                                             第16週:跳投                                                                                                   
15.week:shoot a basket                                            16.week:junp shot

第17週分組比賽                                                      第18週:期末評量
17.week:group match                                               18.week: final evaluation
scorePolicy:
一.技能測驗:   (60%)
     skill test:     (60%) 

二.平時考核:ordinary assessment (30%)

三.學習心得報告:learning report (20%)
materials:
一學校體育排球教材教法與評量           教育部印
Teaching methods and assessment of school sports basketball teaching materials
Ministry of  Education

二. 籃球教室  
basketball Classroom
